articles.author: Veronika Melkozerova
articles.title: Russia reacts to Trump’s sanctions threat: Zzzzzzzzzz - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The U.S. president is ramping up pressure on Moscow to end the war in Ukraine.
articles.content:
Trump on Wednesday threatened to impose more sanctions and tariffs on Russia if President Vladimir Putin fails to make a deal to end the war in Ukraine.
Russia has been waging a full-scale invasion … [+539 chars]

articles.author: The Wall Street Journal
articles.title: Trump Allies Give Europe’s Leaders Reality Check on Ukraine - The Wall Street Journal
